reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish and well-made, with a beautiful color and comfortable fit that's not itchy or irritating. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others say it's very thin. The fit and see-through aspect also get mixed reviews, with some finding it fits well while others say it runs small, and some appreciating the see-through sleeves while others find them too revealing. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I got compliments all night. Very comfortable and elegant looking. True to size but if you’re curvy it has some stretch to it. Read more
items.author: Bianca J. Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great buy
items.body: I love everything about this dress, at first when I received it, I so wanted to cut the sleeves and once I fit it and let my hair down and did my makeup. The dress was everything and fitted me well, value for money and it was a medium. Very comfortable, color is black and you can never go wrong, the medium was good and little stretch, not thick to hold heat but just right Read more
items.author: KONEIKA MORRISON

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase.
items.body: Classy, comfortable and affordable! Read more
items.author: ErikaL

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lemony Yellow
items.body: Cute dress , color is cheery and as described. However, it’s a little see through. Your undergarments will show through the material. So watch be aware if wearing lace underneath. Otherwise nice fit and good stretch. Read more
items.author: Shop and Travel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for Church wear and or early dinner
items.body: This dress was better than I expected. The fabric was a little more clingy than I expected, but still very nice. I’m 5’10” and the length was still below my knees. Read more
items.author: Yvette Knott

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy Yellow Dress
items.body: Awful experience! The dress is not long as described—it’s actually very short and runs small. Extremely disappointing. On top of that, the packaging was terrible. The dress was not wrapped or protected outside of the thin plastic it was shipped in. I could see the dress through the clear, ripped packaging, and to make matters worse, the dress arrived dirty. Very poor presentation and shipping care. I will not be ordering from this seller again. Read more
items.author: Adrienne Hughes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ekaliy Women Bodycon Black Dress
items.body: True to size. Material is great & gives a lot. Got so many compliments. 5’3 165lbs I’m wearing a size large. Read more
items.author: Gorgeous1

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s okay.
items.body: The sleeves around the wrist were too large (too wide). I would have the have them taken in to fit right. I did try the dress in a smaller size and the sleeves at the wrist were still way to wide. The packaging was horrible. The sleeves were so wrinkled, I couldn’t get them to sit right when I tried on the dress. I realize the type of fabric on the sleeves may contribute to the sleeves sticking out, but my goodness, spend a little on packaging for the customer to receive a decent product. It’s also too long. I’m a little over 5’3” and it’s too long for me. It’s almost down to my ankles. The fabric feels thin. I guess that could be a matter of preference. Personally I like my fabrics to be a little thicker and better quality. The dress is pretty. It’s just so wrinkly because of packaging. I feel if it were altered, the sleeves at the wrist tightened, and the fabric not so thin (to my preference) it would make for a beautiful dress. It’s too bad. Read more
items.author: E H

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Brown, Pink, White, Blue, Yellow, Black, Navy Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
